The goal of MetaPipe is to provide an easy, yet powerful tool capable of conduction QTL mapping analyses on metabolomics data.

## Installation

<!-- You can install the released version of MetaPipe from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with: -->

<!-- And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with: -->

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:
``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("villegar/MetaPipe")
```
